identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer
core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Institutional Authority with SaaS Efficiency.
Emotion First: Reduce anxiety for complainants; empower admins.
Content is King: Clear instructions, no jargon.
Negative Space: High density for dashboards, high breathing room for forms.

primary.description: Deep Navy / Slate 900 - The anchor of authority.

brand.description: Royal Blue - For primary actions and active states.

landing_page.description: Left: Immersive architectural imagery with blue overlay. Right: Clean, high-contrast typography with two distinct entry points (Lab vs ICC).

forms.description: Distraction-free. White card on subtle grey background. Progress indicators if multi-step (though single step is preferred for speed).

dashboard.description: Fixed sidebar (Dark Blue). Main content area (White/Grey). Top bar for user profile and quick actions.

buttons.primary: bg-slate-900 text-white hover:bg-blue-700 rounded-md px-6 py-2.5 font-medium transition-all shadow-sm hover:shadow-md
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-900 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 rounded-md px-6 py-2.5 font-medium transition-all
buttons.ghost: text-slate-600 hover:text-slate-900 hover:bg-slate-100 rounded-md px-4 py-2

inputs.default: bg-white border-slate-200 focus:border-blue-500 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-100 rounded-md h-11 px-4 text-slate-900 placeholder:text-slate-400 transition-all

cards.default: bg-white border border-slate-200 rounded-lg p-6 hover:border-blue-200 transition-colors

status_badges.pending: bg-yellow-50 text-yellow-700 border border-yellow-200 px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium
status_badges.in_progress: bg-blue-50 text-blue-700 border border-blue-200 px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium
status_badges.resolved: bg-green-50 text-green-700 border border-green-200 px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium

landing_hero.usage: Landing page split screen background or hero image

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. UPDATE CSS VARIABLES: Replace the content of `/app/frontend/src/index.css` with the variables provided in `colors.css_variables`. This is CRITICAL for the Blue/White theme.
2. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to `index.css`.
3. SHADCN CUSTOMIZATION: When using Shadcn components, override the default `radius` to `0.3rem` (approx 5px) for a cleaner, more professional look.

4. LANDING PAGE: Create a split-screen layout. Left side is the 'Modern institutional architecture' image with a blue overlay (bg-slate-900/80). Right side contains the 'Lab Complaint' and 'ICC Complaint' large cards.
5. FORMS: Use `react-hook-form` + `zod` for validation. Wrap forms in a `Card` component with `max-w-2xl mx-auto`.
6. DASHBOARD: Create a `DashboardLayout` component that includes a Sidebar (dark blue) and a Topbar. The content area should be `bg-slate-50`.
7. NOTIFICATIONS: Use `sonner` for toast notifications on form submission and status updates.
8. ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure all text has sufficient contrast. The primary blue (#2563EB) on white is safe. Avoid light grey text on white backgrounds.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors or subtle textures.
Use 'Manrope' for all headings (h1-h3) and 'Inter' for body text.
All interactive elements must have a `data-testid`.
Ensure mobile responsiveness. Stack columns on mobile.
